events.title: Sickbay Temporarily Offline
events.text: Captain, our sick bay just went offline. We're currently looking for the cause and trying to get it back online.

buttons.text: I hope no one is hurt by this.

events.title: Crew Member's Illness Spreads
events.text: Our sick crew member's illness spread to others without access to the sickbay.

events.title: Sickbay Back Online
events.text: The sickbay is back online. It looks like no one needed it in the meantime.

buttons.text: At least there's something to be thankful for.
